abstracts.cdata!:
The key objectives of the project are to
            assist in reducing Government holdings and alleviating the
            recurrent administrative and financial burden of public
            enterprises (PE). The Government's privatization effort
            is part of the medium term economic framework which aims to
            rehabilitate public finance and improve competitiveness.
            Project components include : i) general institutional
            support to the Government entities in charge of the
            privatization program, and ii) a total of 400 man-months of
            consulting services for the preparation and implementation
            of privatization plans, including advisory services to give
            technical advice on sales strategy, valuation, financial
            engineering, legal issues etc. Some limited assistance will
            also be given to develop national expertise in new debt
            reduction and restructuring techniques.
